properties.name: notifier.backend
properties.description: Defines which messanger notifications will be sent to.

properties.name: telegram.bot.token
properties.description: Token that will be used for Telegram API calls.

properties.name: telegram.chat_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the notifications channel in Telegram.

properties.name: myteam.bot.token
properties.description: Token that will be used for MyTeam API calls.

properties.name: myteam.chat_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the notifications channel in MyTeam.
